title: Removing Array Elements Using Callback
description: In this lab, we will be working on a JavaScript programming challenge that involves manipulating arrays. The goal of this lab is to write a function that removes elements from the end of an array until a specific condition is met, and returns the removed elements. You will be using various JavaScript array methods and a callback function to complete this challenge.

meta.title: JavaScript Array Manipulation | Programming Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript by removing elements from the end until a specific condition is met. Improve your coding skills with this engaging programming challenge.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Array, Manipulation, Programming, Challenge, Coding

steps.title: Remove Array Elements From the End While Condition Is Met

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
